title-group.article-title: RATIONAL POINTS ON DIAGONAL QUARTIC SURFACES

abstract.p: We searched up to height 10 7 for rational points on diagonal quartic surfaces. The computations fill several gaps in earlier lists computed by Pinch, Swinnerton-Dyer, and Bright.

ref.label: Be

ref.label: Br2
